class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 19 - June 25, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: A writing intensive senior seminar utilizing the primary literature to examine current issues, trends, and controversies in the field of neuroscience and behavioral biology, with a special focus on contemporary European work. This course is limited to those enrolled in Emory study abroad
sections: Class Nbr: 1359, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: K. Easterling, Status: Open
